Wonderful ambiance set slightly below ground with very appealing decor.  It was a great first impression followed by the best steak I've ever had.  The steaks were seasoned well and cooked to perfection.  The service was also fantastic..friendly and engaging...it was just a wonderful experience.  Dinner for five with two bottles of a very nice Malbec for under 200....I walked away content and ready to go back again.  Oh...did I mention the flan....heaven!
